headline.main: Wanted: Female Candidates for Algeria's Parliament Quota
headline.print_headline: Wanted: Female Candidates for Algeria's Parliament Quota

lead_paragraph: Bahrain's parliament on Sunday approved a constitutional change allowing military courts to try civilians, the kingdom's latest rollback on reforms made after its 2011 Arab Spring protests that likely will stoke an ongoing government crackdown on dissent.
